name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior Solution Engineer with 10+ years of expertise in **cloud technology**, **data architecture**, and **data analytics**. Proficient in delivering high-performance software solutions as a Full Stack Developer, utilizing **Python**, **SQL**, and **machine learning** to enhance SaaS offerings. Demonstrated experience in developing and deploying secure and maintainable applications on **Azure** and **AWS**, with a strong focus on **devops tooling** and **orchestration tools** for efficient operations. Skilled in building solutions that leverage **dbt**, **spark**, and **containers** to drive business intelligence and improve real-time decision-making.

Advanced capabilities in solution engineering complemented by a robust background in leadership and collaboration, enabling effective customer communication and presentations. Dedicated to creating impactful systems that align with compliance standards and exceed client expectations.

experience.responsibilities:
• Designed and implemented scalable **solution engineering** practices for healthcare and finance using **Python** (FastAPI), with adherence to regulatory standards like HIPAA, FHIR, GDPR, PCI DSS, and SOX.
• Built and deployed **SaaS** mobile apps with **Flutter** and **React Native**, delivering a smooth user experience on both iOS and Android, enhancing customer communication and collaboration.
• Spearheaded the transition from monolithic applications to microservices architectures utilizing **Docker** and **Kubernetes** (EKS), improving system performance by **30%** in availability and stability.
• Developed and maintained a comprehensive **data architecture** with **PostgreSQL**, **MongoDB**, **Redis**, and **GraphQL**, optimizing for large-scale data ingestion and querying, resulting in a **50%** reduction in data retrieval times.
• Designed and deployed machine learning models for crucial use cases including patient risk prediction and financial fraud detection using **Python** and integrated real-time inference services into the backend, achieving accuracy improvements of **15%**.
• Established MLOps pipelines using **MLflow**, **DVC**, and **Apache Airflow**, facilitating continuous training and deployment of models, enhancing the agility of the development process.
• Integrated AI-powered features into client applications, such as customizable health dashboards and predictive alerts, utilizing **Azure ML** and **AWS Sagemaker** for enhanced data analytics.
• Implemented enterprise-level **DevOps** pipelines through **GitHub Actions**, ensuring a seamless CI/CD cycle with **75%** reductions in deployment time across environments.
• Created sophisticated financial **data visualization** tools using **D3.js**, enabling real-time insights into transaction trends with an improved analytical capacity for operational KPIs.
• Collaborated closely with data scientists to deploy **NLP models** utilizing **spaCy** and **Hugging Face Transformers**, integrating advanced document parsing into core services through RESTful APIs.
• Established thorough testing strategies leveraging **Jest**, **Cypress**, and **PyTest**, ensuring robust coverage across both front-end and back-end systems, enhancing reliability by **20%**.
• Integrated **Azure Cognitive Search** and **ElasticSearch**, empowering enhanced search capabilities across extensive unstructured and structured health and financial data.

Engineered scalable **SaaS** solutions by leading the development of financial platforms with a **microservices-based architecture** using **Node.js** (NestJS/Express) and **Python** (FastAPI, Django), improving system throughput by **30%** for high-volume transaction environments.

Designed and implemented data architecture solutions for real-time analytics, constructing dynamic, user-focused front-end applications with **React** (18), **Vue 3**, **Next.js**, and **TypeScript**, utilizing **Redux Toolkit** and **Tailwind CSS** to develop intuitive interfaces for financial dashboards and admin portals.

Conducted data analysis and built real-time transaction monitoring dashboards with **React**, **D3.js**, and **Power BI Embedded**, enabling operations teams to detect anomalies and generate actionable insights from **1M** transactions a day.

Orchestrated cloud technology integrations, deploying **Kafka**, **RabbitMQ**, and **Azure Service Bus** to enhance event-driven architectures, effectively managing asynchronous communication and processing for **100K** alerts daily.

Developed robust ETL pipelines with **Python**, **Apache Airflow**, and **Azure Data Factory**, facilitating batch and real-time financial data ingestion from internal and third-party sources, improving data availability by **40%**.

Implemented machine learning models for fraud detection utilizing **scikit-learn**, **XGBoost**, and **Azure Machine Learning**, achieving a **20%** reduction in false positives by analyzing transaction patterns and user behavior.

Created and optimized **ML pipelines** for tasks including credit scoring, churn prediction, and transaction classification using **MLflow** and **Airflow**, integrating model inference into backend services for real-time decision-making, impacting over **500K** users.

Leveraged **cloud technology** and **SaaS** principles to design, optimize, and implement scalable backend services using **Python** (FastAPI, Django) and **Node.js** (NestJS, Express) for a global e-commerce platform, achieving **99.9%** uptime and reduced latency by **30%** across key modules like checkout, cart, and order fulfillment.
Engineered real-time features powered by **Kafka** and **RabbitMQ** for event-driven architecture, leading to **50%** faster order updates and enhanced inventory tracking that improved customer support responsiveness.
Utilized **SQL** databases including **MongoDB** and **PostgreSQL**, ensuring fault-tolerant data access and achieving a **40%** improvement in data retrieval speeds by optimizing data architecture for high-traffic workflows.
Developed and refined frontend applications using **React** (18), **Vue 3**, and **Angular**, applying **TypeScript**, **Redux Toolkit**, and **Tailwind CSS** to deliver fast, responsive user experiences, benefitting over **1 million** monthly active users.
Integrated **machine learning** and **data analytics** techniques via **scikit-learn**, **LightGBM**, and **TensorFlow** for AI-driven recommendation engines, which improved product listing personalization and increased conversion rates by **25%** based on real-time analytics.
Implemented advanced caching strategies using **Redis** for product metadata and shopping sessions, achieving a **60%** reduction in database read pressure and enhancing overall application responsiveness.
Utilized **devops tooling** and orchestration tools like **Kubernetes** for blue-green deployments and feature flags management through **LaunchDarkly**, facilitating controlled rollouts and A/B testing while ensuring high availability during updates.
Created responsive, SEO-optimized e-commerce UIs utilizing **Next.js** and **HTML5/CSS3**, focusing on mobile-first engagement and ensuring compliance with accessibility standards (WCAG 2.1), significantly boosting site engagement metrics.
Established secure payment workflows integrated with **Stripe**, **PayPal**, and **Razorpay**, ensuring PCI compliance and secure handling of sensitive transactions, which improved customer trust and payment success rates.
Applied role-based access control (RBAC) and **OAuth 2.0** to secure customer and admin access, ensuring GDPR compliance and robust user data protection practices throughout the platform.
